Posts.Content: Help please , I’m in bed all the time , weak legs , and sad . I could deal with the diarrhea but the weakness in limbs is horrible. Did anyone experience this on verzenio together with zomeda infusion or FASLODEX shots . It’s alot of meds . I have stage 4 which spread to ribs only . So scared , help please with advice . My CA15-3 BLOOD TEST RESULT went down to 23 from 59 . The 59 was the reason for the pet scan which light up at rib on one side . Please tell me your experience. I’m so upset and crying all the time . I can’t eat .
Posts.Title: I’m on verzenio 150 mil, FASLODEX injections and Zometa infusion . Anyone

Posts.Content: Well you are a very caring sole and now you have this caring sole to talk to. Pot makes me cough so I stopped , I have Ativan and Xanax but not together . This is all very scary with no other options as we have an incurable but treatable disease . Treatable (hogwash) I just wish we could feel good while treatment which will never end until my end üò© no choices , just carry on . Hoping you are feeling ok and able to get some laughs in sometimes . I watch family feud and funny stuff and I still can laugh. Not yesterday , tears all day . ü•∞
